title: Paying well for t210 PINK, ORANGE & YELLOW bordered examples
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Paying well for t210 PINK, ORANGE & YELLOW bordered examples
posts.post_content:
You guys probably saw this post coming.  Well, regardless of how the pink t210s came into being, I think I'll go ahead and try to find some others anyway.  Of course, I'm still collecting the oranges too and hoping for my first yellow at some point.  I've got plenty of t210s, t209s and hordes of other cards to offer in trade too if that helps.

Thanks in advance,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

[quote name="shammus" post=736559]You guys probably saw this post coming./QUOTE]

*

Brian, please take this in the spirit of humor ...  some of us, can read you like a book.   :D
